name: com.failmode/voicemode
description: Natural voice conversations for AI assistants - STT/TTS via MCP

environment_variables.description: OpenAI API key for cloud-based STT/TTS (optional - local services can be installed)
environment_variables.name: OPENAI_API_KEY

environment_variables.description: Enable debug mode with detailed logging (true/false)
environment_variables.name: VOICEMODE_DEBUG

environment_variables.description: Skip TTS and show text only for faster response (true/false)
environment_variables.name: VOICEMODE_SKIP_TTS

environment_variables.description: Prefer local services over cloud when available (true/false, default: true)
environment_variables.name: VOICEMODE_PREFER_LOCAL

environment_variables.description: Audio format: pcm, mp3, wav, flac, aac, opus (default: pcm)
environment_variables.name: VOICEMODE_AUDIO_FORMAT

environment_variables.description: Whisper model: tiny, base, small, medium, large (default: base)
environment_variables.name: VOICEMODE_WHISPER_MODEL

environment_variables.description: Disable silence detection for continuous recording (true/false)
environment_variables.name: VOICEMODE_DISABLE_SILENCE_DETECTION
